meaningMnemonic: You've made yourself a <radical>tree</radical> <radical>bookshelf</radical> (that is, a bookshelf cut into a tree), so you build a <kanji>fence</kanji> to keep the riffraff out.
readingMnemonic: On your <kanji>fence</kanji>, you hang up a <reading>sack</reading> (さく) to accept donations.
